resources.string:
Coronavirus disease (COVID 19) is an infectious disease caused by the coronovirus.
The most of the people who fall sick by encountering with the disease may experience mild to moderate symptoms and can recover without special treatment.

The most common symptoms of people affected with corona virus are fever, dry cough, tiredness. The less common symptoms are aches and pains, sore throat, diarrhoea, conjunctivitis, headache, loss of taste and smell. The serious symptoms are difficult in breathing or shortness of breathe. These symptoms can confirm on being affected with the virus.

Wash your hands frequently for 20+ seconds with soap and water. Stay at home and limit contact with others. Routinely clean frequently touched spaces in your home. Seek medical help if you are suffering from a fever, cough or difficulty breathing. Limit contact with pets and animals.
Dont go to crowded areas. Dont touch your face. Dont be in close contact with others. Dont ignore symptoms. Dont leave your home, especially if sick.
